com.fluidops.fedx.util
Class EndpointFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.fedx.util.EndpointFactory

public class EndpointFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class providing various methods to create Endpoints to be used as federation members.

Author:
Andreas Schwarte

loadSPARQLEndpoint

public static Endpoint loadSPARQLEndpoint(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String endpoint)
                                   throws FedXException
Construct a SPARQL endpoint using the the provided information.

Parameters:
name - a descriptive name, e.g. http://dbpedia
endpoint - the URL of the SPARQL endpoint, e.g. http://dbpedia.org/sparql
Returns:
an initialized Endpoint containing the repository
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
FedXException

loadFederationMembers

public static java.util.List<Endpoint> loadFederationMembers(java.io.File dataConfig)
                                                      throws FedXException
Utility function to load federation members from a data configuration file. A data configuration file provides information about federation members in form of ntriples. Currently the types NativeStore and SPARQLEndpoint are supported. For details please refer to the documentation in NativeGraphRepositoryInformation and SPARQLGraphRepositoryInformation.

Parameters:
dataConfig -
Returns:
a list of initialized endpoints, i.e. the federation members
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.Exception
FedXException

Throws:
FedXException

getId

public static java.lang.String getId(java.lang.String endpointID,
                                     java.lang.String type)
Construct a unique id for the provided SPARQL Endpoint, e.g http://dbpedia.org/ => %type%_dbpedia.org

Parameters:
endpoint -
type - the repository type, e.g. native, sparql, etc
Returns:
